title: I'm the leader in the Club but I'm still not in it
body: This has been going for about a month now, and it hasn't been resolved yet. I have sent a ticket to Riot but a Bot tells me to download "Automated Troubleshooting - Hextech Repair Tool"

replies.body: Is there a formal process for reporting this club owner issue? I still have the same issue with my club Red Dragon Syndicate, haven't been able to figure out if I need to submit a support ticket, or if it's just a matter of time before it's resolved for everyone. Information out there is kind of scarce still...

For some context, there were some issues with clubs as well as a period of downtime.  One of the issues as a result were some club owners not being able to see their own club.  This was resovled for a majority of players, but some still can't see their club.  We can help refresh that through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) which is the preferred method; though, I'm happy to when I can.  

That said, I performed the refresh I mentioned on your club so everything should be okay now.  Let me know!
im having the same problem my club is IronDookies and tag is IronD

I sent a support ticket a couple weeks back about me not being able to see the club I am a leader of and the response I got was that it was being looked at but nothing has been fixed for me. Name is "SquirtleSquad7" and club is "I Got Ult" with the clan tag "UCSB1". Thanks
Most of the club issues have been resolved, but there have been some lingering cases since then.  I was able to locate your club and have refreshed it.  Everything should be groovy now!
Thank you Porocles!! Everything is indeed groovy now :)

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qMtxz0Qs,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-29T16:20:05.113+0000)
>
> Most of the club issues have been resolved, but there have been some lingering cases since then.  I was able to locate your club and have refreshed it.  Everything should be groovy now!

Sorry Porocles, but i still can't see my club... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}   I even ran a full repair on the client just in case... And the club name is Laufeyson only... ._. i haven't seen it for ages and remembered wrong.
Yep that did the trick, much appreciated!
This may have been a result of a recent club outage that's caused some syncing issue.  Let me know the name and tag of your club, and I'll look into this for you!
I am a different player butting in, but it happened to me as well. Club name Nerdfest. Club tag Wiggs.
I've refreshed your club, so everything looks fine now!
You are amazing, awesome, and an inspiration!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qMtxz0Qs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-26T17:24:46.625+0000)
>

Could you help with my club Annie's
My club name is Cheeky Skrubs and the tag is Innit

Hey guys, i have the same issue, i wrote a supp ticket, but got no solution yet, so i ask you Porocles, to help me pleaseee.
My summoner name is beebunneh, club tag is Lokid, club name is Loki Laufeyson. Thank you so much in advance!

(Btw... off topic... but did the new client patch issue got fixed? I'm not getting the error message anymore when i open it.)
